title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction â Major Civil Engineering Projects; Areas involved; Fundamental principles; Concepts; Ethics in Civil Engineering; Materials â Different construction materials â bricks; aggregates; cement; concrete; steel; FRP and others. Construction methodologies and equipments.
